name: Rollin' out of Space
description:
[made in collaboration with amazing composers / people 

Aniah - https://itch.io/profile/anaiah

lyckstolp - https://lyckstolp.itch.io/

pheonix - https://phoenixmega.itch.io/

(and one more guy that didn't send his itch page yet)

 (thanks y'all, wouldn't have been the same without you) ]

a 2d top down shooter with a small twist,

R to reload, WASD to move, left mouse button + cursor to aim and shoot. 

dodge the falling blocks, good luck.

(scoring and UI is entirely broken, so sorry about that, will fix once rating is done)
